page.title: 02 OUR TOWN
page.content: Whitley Bay has many attractions for the young and old.It's lovely long sandy beaches are good for keen walkers,brave swimmers or lazy sunbathers.There are also other attractions such as singing,dancing and carnival parades which are usually performed in the Panama Dip.If it is raining there is no need to worry and there are still lots of places to go to.You can go to the amusement arcades, the ice rink, the swimming baths, the play house and the roller rink. Whitley Bay has some poor points as well.In the summer the beaches get very crowded and there is lots of litter lying about.The indoor attractions also get very crowded and they become hot and stuffy. We could improve Whitley Bay by having more beach activities and more sunshine!
